# 目录二

# 子目录一

# this is html2
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>

<head>
  <meta charset="utf-8">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0, user-scalable=0, minimum-scale=1.0, maximum-scale=1.0">
  <title>iScroll</title>
  <style type="text/css">
    * {
      -webkit-box-sizing: border-box;
      -moz-box-sizing: border-box;
      box-sizing: border-box;
    }

    body,
    ul,
    li {
      padding: 0;
      margin: 0;
      border: 0;
    }

    #x_wrapper {
      position: absolute;
      z-index: 1;
      width: 200px;
      height: 50px;
      overflow: hidden;
      background-color: #ccc;
    }

    #x_wrapper #scroller {
      width: 800px;
      position: absolute;
      z-index: 1;
    }

    #x_wrapper ul {
      list-style: none;
      font-size: 0;
    }

    #x_wrapper li {
      font-size: 16px;
      display: inline-block;
      width: 100px;
      text-align: center;
      height: 50px;
      line-height: 50px;
      background-color: pink;
    }

    #y_wrapper {
      position: absolute;
      z-index: 1;
      top: 100px;
      height: 200px;
      border: 1px solid skyblue;
      left: 0;
      width: 200px;
      background: #ccc;
      overflow: hidden;
    }

    #y_wrapper #scroller ul {
      list-style: none;
      padding: 0;
      margin: 0;
      width: 200px;
      text-align: left;
    }

    #y_wrapper #scroller li {
      padding: 0 10px;
      height: 40px;
      line-height: 40px;
      background-color: #fafafa;
      font-size: 14px;
    }
  </style>
</head>

<body>
  <div>
    <div id="y_wrapper">
      <div id="scroller">
        <ul>
          <li>Pretty row 1</li>
          <li>Pretty row 2</li>
          <li>Pretty row 3</li>
          <li>Pretty row 4</li>
          <li>Pretty row 5</li>
          <li>Pretty row 6</li>
          <li>Pretty row 7</li>
          <li>Pretty row 8</li>
        </ul>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div id="x_wrapper">
      <div id="scroller">
        <ul>
          <li>111</li>
          <li>222</li>
          <li>333</li>
          <li>444</li>
          <li>555</li>
          <li>666</li>
          <li>777</li>
          <li>888</li>
        </ul>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
  <script type="text/javascript" src="./iscroll.js"></script>
  <script type="text/javascript">
    var x_scroll, y_scroll;
    window.onload = function () {
      x_scroll = new IScroll('#x_wrapper', {
        scrollX: true,
        scrollY: false,
        mouseWheel: true,
      });
      y_scroll = new IScroll('#y_wrapper', {
        scrollbars: true,
        mouseWheel: true, // 支持滚轮滚动
        interactiveScrollbars: true, // 可拖动滚动条
        shrinkScrollbars: 'scale', // 滚动到末端时缩放滚动条
        fadeScrollbars: true // 不滚动时隐藏滚动条
      });
    }
  </script>
</body>

</html>
